name: ShopSAR
tag_list: auto-accessories, auto-parts, performance-aftermarket-parts, car-covers, floor-mats, seat-covers
description: ShopSAR is an online retailer of cu
overview:
Whether you drive a Cadillac, Toyota, or Nissan, from classic cars to sports cars to SUVs, from mini-vans to Mini Coopers, use ShopSAR.com to achieve the look that you want at a price you can afford!

ShopSAR.com is the place to find custom leather interiors from Katzkin, E&G Classic Grilles / Grills, Lloyd Floor Mats, Wheelskins Steering Wheel Covers and a wide range of aftermarket auto accessories including stainless steel pillar post trim, rocker panels, fender wheel opening moldings, wood dash kits, chrome mirror covers and door handles (just to name a few!). Our expert staff is on hand to help you choose the right parts. We not only sell these pieces, we’ve been installing them ourselves for over two decades!

Just look at the galleries on our company website to see some of the recent work we’ve done on a wide variety of cars. Grilles, leather kits, bodyside moulding, chrome time - as you can see these parts are much more than just boxes on shelves to us!
